abstract: General Electric was said to be near a deal to buy the medical diagnostic unit of Abbott Laboratories for more than $5 billion.
snippet: General Electric was said to be near a deal to buy the medical diagnostic unit of Abbott Laboratories for more than $5 billion.
lead_paragraph: General Electric was near a deal last night to buy the medical diagnostic unit of Abbott Laboratories for more than $5 billion, according to people involved in the negotiations.

headline.main: G.E. Near Deal for Abbott’s Diagnostic Unit

byline.original: By ANDREW ROSS SORKIN and CLAUDIA DEUTSCH
